Welcome to OCS-CI’s documentation!¶

This is a documentation for the OCS-CI project. OCS-CI is a testing framework based on pytest to test Red Hat OCS features and functionality using AWS and other supported platforms.

Package documentations:

  • ocs_ci modules
    • ocs_ci package
